DOC.brief_summary: Translation and validation of the BOMET-QoL-10 questionnaire in Germany and assessment of its validity and responsiveness.
DOC.detailed_description: Aim of this study is to translate the questionnaire and to examine the psychometric properties of BOMET-QoL-10 in a German population. Correlations with the EORTC QLQ-C30/BM22 at the time of enrolment and throughout the study aim to verify that the BOMET-QoL-10 is reliable, valid and able to detect stabilization or changes in quality of life.
